name: Bubbles (itch) (pixel shock)
description:
Bubbles

Press Left and Right to move the white dot.
Stay in the bubbles to get points.
If you get too close to the small coloured dot, it's game over.
Each bubble has a different movement pattern depending on the colour of the dot in the middle.

The HTML export is slow and flickery.
MiniScript file is included in downloads.

Press Space to start
